Description_lang: Casting and attacking builds stacks of Spite. At 5, a Spiteful Stormbolt arcs towards your current target, dealing ${$377466s1*($382426d/$382426t1)*(1+$@versadmg)} Nature damage over $382426d.Upon expiration the bolt returns, increasing the amount of Spite needed by 1 and permanently increasing Spiteful Stormbolt's damage against them until either of you die.
AuraDescription_lang: All future Spiteful Stormbolts will target this unit.
